name: Watermelon
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of other fruits
benefits: Watermelon is one of the most water-rich foods available, with over 90% water content. This extremely low calorie density combined with high volume makes it particularly satiating for weight loss. Also provides lycopene and other beneficial compounds.
amount: Part of 3 daily servings of other fruits (Daily Dozen)

quotes: In a large bowl, combine the watermelon, peaches, blueberries and lemon juice.
